page.title: 10Adran yr Urdd,Pontybrenin.
page.content: 'Yr Adran'is like a Brownie or Guide Pack only that it is Welsh and it is for boys and girls.We meet every Tuesday in the school hall,we pay ten pence entrance fee.There are two kinds of club,one for the 8_11yrs and another for the comprehensive school pupils.The club for the younger children is called the "Adran",and the club for the older children is called the "Aelwyd". I go to the Adran because I'm 10.Our teachers put us into different groups,A,B,C and Ch,I'm in group Ch.We play different games like draughts, cards,Monopoly,and rounders in the summer when the weather is nice. Every year there is a Urdd Eisteddfod,this year it was in Cardiff.In the Eisteddfod you can sing,dance,play an instrument or recite all in the Welsh language.
